name: DynamicBulkDetailsResolver

properties.name: idsGroupedByBulkId
properties.description: Map containing the ids to be retrieved per bulk request.
properties.rawdescription: Map containing the ids to be retrieved per bulk request.

properties.name: resultsOfBulkLoad
properties.description: Provides an Observable of the results of all bulk requests.
properties.rawdescription: Provides an Observable of the results of all bulk requests.

description: An abstract class to simplify implementing the DynamicDetailsResolver interface for performing bulk resolving.
rawdescription: An abstract class to simplify implementing the DynamicDetailsResolver interface for performing bulk resolving.

methods.name: addIdsToBeLoaded
methods.rawdescription: Adds a single id or an array of ids to the idsGroupedByBulkId Map for the provided bulkRequestId.
methods.description: Adds a single id or an array of ids to the idsGroupedByBulkId Map for the provided bulkRequestId.

methods.name: buildRetrievalAlert
methods.rawdescription: Called in case a specific id wasn't found as part of the returned dataset.
methods.description: Called in case a specific id wasn't found as part of the returned dataset.

methods.name: extractIdsToBeRetrieved
methods.rawdescription: Used to extract the ids to be provided to the performBulkRequest method from the configuration.
methods.description: Used to extract the ids to be provided to the performBulkRequest method from the configuration.

methods.name: getResult$
methods.rawdescription: Provides an Observable of the results of the given bulkRequestId.
methods.description: Provides an Observable of the results of the given bulkRequestId.

methods.name: isEntityOfId
methods.rawdescription:
Checks wether an object is of given id.
Will by default compare the id attribute with the given id.
methods.description: Checks wether an object is of given id. Will by default compare the id attribute with the given id.

methods.name: performBulkRequest
methods.rawdescription: Used to perform the request(s) to retrieve the provided ids.
methods.description: Used to perform the request(s) to retrieve the provided ids.

methods.name: serialize
methods.rawdescription:
Default implementation compatible with serializing an object or an Array of objects.
Calls serializeSingleObject for an object and for every entry within the array.
methods.description: Default implementation compatible with serializing an object or an Array of objects. Calls serializeSingleObject for an object and for every entry within the array.

methods.name: serializeSingleObject
methods.rawdescription:
Responsible for serializing a single object. The returned value will be e.g. stored in the widgets configuration to the backend.
It should reduce the provided object to it's essentials attributes to find it via API, so e.g. the id.
It is basically reversing the thing performed as part of the resolve method.
methods.description: Responsible for serializing a single object. The returned value will be e.g. stored in the widgets configuration to the backend. It should reduce the provided object to it's essentials attributes to find it via API, so e.g. the id. It is basically reversing the thing performed as part of the resolve method.
